### Checklist
- [ ] I have created a folder in `packs/` with my pack ID
- [ ] I have added `pack.json` with all required fields
- [ ] I have added a `preview.gif` (max 2MB)
- [ ] All animation files are under 10MB each
- [ ] I have updated `manifest.json`
- [ ] I have rights to share these animations
- [ ] No copyrighted content without permission
- [ ] No NSFW or inappropriate content
